docs.lead_paragraph: BETHESDA, Md., Oct. 13 -- Specialists in surgery, chemotherapy and radiation treatment from the United States and China sat in a 12th-floor lounge here this afternoon and discussed their common war against man's most feared enemy -- cancer.
docs.abstract: 11 Chinese med and health workers, on 3-wk tour of US med and health facilities, rept on use of drug in treatment of Hodgkin's disease in humans
docs.snippet: BETHESDA, Md., Oct. 13 -- Specialists in surgery, chemotherapy and radiation treatment from the United States and China sat in a 12th-floor lounge here this afternoon and discussed their common war against man's most feared enemy -- cancer.

byline.original: By WALTER SULLIVANSpecial to The New York Times
